nodes.text: Lisum was a male researcher who lived during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Lisum first appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. In the game, Lisum was never actually seen as a non-player character. Instead, the player would communicate with Lisum through a radio at a destroyed research camp. For this reason, his species is unknown, but his name and gender was identified in the quest journal.
